Description:
   New a porperties file in the subfolder of the resource folder can't be used.Throw exception.

Step to reproduce:
   1. new a report and insert a label
   2. click the blank place of the report, go to the property editor choose resource tab
   3. click the Add... button
   4. in the "Browse resource files" dialog choose resource Folder and type "a.properties" in the input box below.
   5. choose the a subfolder under the resource Folder and new another property file "b.properties" (please refer to the screenshot)
   6. choose a.property 
   7. go back to the lay out and click the label
   8. choose the loclization and click ... button
   9. Add key to it works ok
   10. go back to choose the b.properties and repeat the step 7 to 9

Actual result:
   use a.properties under resource folder is ok, but b.properties which under the subfolder of the resource folder will get error
